code: public void addValue(double newValue) {     boolean successful = false.     do {         final long currentBits = this.averageBits.get().         final double currentAvg = getAverage().         final double newAvg = (alpha * newValue) + ((1 - alpha) * currentAvg).         final long newBits = Double.doubleToLongBits(newAvg).         successful = averageBits.compareAndSet(currentBits, newBits).     } while (successful == false). }
